TopicTitle: UMADBRO MK I Codename: drunken devil

Articles.Content:
Hello folks! 

I had an interesting idea after I found out, that the small inline reaction wheel is pretty strong. I tried to build a small rover and thought, how great it would be to have a single wheeled rover?

I was so glad, that I recorded this creation. What do you think about it? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

There was also a lot of efford in the new intro/credit animation. What are your thoughts? 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4rqBKCf50Xs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
